trans-unit.source: The NetMsmqSecurityElement class encapsulates the MSMQ security features available when using the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: De klasse NetMsmqSecurityElement kapselt de MSMQ-beveiligingsfuncties beschikbaar wanneer u de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"> </xref> binding.

trans-unit.source: Objects of this type are created by creating an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding> binding.
trans-unit.target: Objecten van dit type zijn gemaakt door het maken van een exemplaar van de <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>binding.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>

trans-unit.source: You can then use this object to reference all of the various security settings related to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding> binding.
trans-unit.target: U kunt dit object vervolgens gebruiken om te verwijzen naar alle van de verschillende beveiligingsinstellingen die betrekking hebben op de <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>binding.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetMsmqSecurityElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetMsmqSecurityElement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"> </xref> -exemplaar dat is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"> </xref> binding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq> instance encapsulates the SOAP message security settings.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq>exemplaar kapselt de beveiligingsinstellingen van de SOAP-bericht.</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"> </xref> -exemplaar dat is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"> </xref> binding.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"> </xref> -exemplaar dat is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"> </xref> binding.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the type of security used by the associated `NetMsmqBinding`.
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschap bepaalt het type beveiliging die wordt gebruikt door de bijbehorende `NetMsmqBinding`.

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the acceptable values: - `None` - No security will be used.
trans-unit.target: De volgende lijst beschrijft de acceptabele waarden:- `None` -geen beveiliging wordt gebruikt.
- `Message` -Beveiliging op basis van een bericht wordt gebruikt.

trans-unit.source: - `Both` - Both message-based security and transport security will be used.
trans-unit.target: - `Both` -Beide berichten gebaseerde beveiligings- en beveiliging wordt gebruikt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"> </xref> -exemplaar dat is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"> </xref> binding.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement"></xref> element that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement"> </xref> element dat is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"> </xref> binding.

trans-unit.source: This property enables access to Msmq Transport security settings.
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschap kunt toegang tot de beveiligingsinstellingen voor Transport van Msmq.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> instance that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"> </xref> -exemplaar dat is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"> </xref> binding.
